mapper.select: SELECT pms_monitor_plan.id, pms_monitor_plan.name, pms_monitor_plan.description, pms_monitor_plan.punch_count, pms_monitor_plan.punch_quantity, pms_monitor_plan.start_time, pms_monitor_plan.end_time, pms_monitor_plan.like_count, pms_monitor_plan.monitor_quantity, pms_monitor_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_monitor_plan_status.description AS plan_status FROM pms_monitor_plan, pms_monitor_pattern, pms_monitor_plan_status, pms_user_monitor_plan WHERE pms_monitor_plan.id IN ( SELECT monitor_plan_id FROM pms_user_monitor_plan WHERE pms_user_monitor_plan.user_id = #{uid} ) AND pms_monitor_plan.monitor_pattern_id = pms_monitor_pattern.id AND pms_monitor_plan.plan_status_id = pms_monitor_plan_status.id ORDER BY pms_monitor_plan.id DESC
